pageContext.claim: “And then we have judges in the Ninth Circuit in particular, but we have judges that will rule against us no matter what.”
pageContext.analysis: The 9th Circuit rules in favor of the Trump administration all the time, including just weeks before this remark. Trump frequently complains about this federal appeals court, which is based in California, because it previously blocked the Trump administration's ban on travelers from certain majority-Muslim countries before the Supreme Court reinstated it, and because of other high-profile cases.
